DOC.brief_summary: The investigator conduct brief educational intervention pregnant woman yet receive influenza vaccine pregnancy improve uptake seasonal influenza vaccine .
DOC.brief_title: Brief Influenza Vaccine Education Pregnant Women
DOC.criteria: singleton pregnancy 18 year age old least second trimester pregnancy Cantonese speaking Hong Kong resident serious medical obstetrical complication yet receive influenza vaccine pregnancy stay Hong Kong least two week delivery . entitle health benefit Hong Kong ( NEP )
